Ellouise Joan Lagunzad

SONDER

SONDER A Memory Within" is an interactive short film experience that invites creatives to step into two possible futures, one ruled by automation, the other co-created with AI. Through immersive memory journeys, the film challenges viewers to reflect on technology, creativity, and the human spirit in a rapidly evolving world.
